Class GuiPlayer

    • gui.GameObject
      • gui.GuiPlayer

    public class GuiPlayer
extends GameObject
    Class for GUI aspects of the player.
    Author:
    Maks Turtiainen, Vili Ahava

        public void tick()
        Updates the player velocity information based on key events, and calls updatePos() to check for collision and finally updating the player position.

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()

        Returns:
        new Rectangle() that corresponds to the object dimensions

      • updatePos

        public void updatePos(int newY,
                      int newX)
        Method for updating player position based on velocity. Checks if the player collides with other GameObject than itself, and then updates its position based on the result of collision. Also checks if a monster is present in a block and initiates a combat sequence if necessary.
        Parameters:
        newY - the Y-axis position the player will be next rendered to
        newX - the X-axis position the player will be next rendered to
